    Grow Rack v3

    Upgrade to aeration / polysty containers, move from SWICK -> SIP on top of 1/2" louvered grate via DIY capillary matting; added 3x 20w strips containing far-red 660nm diodes.

    Jun 14, 2020

    Grow Rack v2

    Second iteration built for greens, herbs, peppers, root vegetables, and propogation. Addition of reflective grow tent on bottom 48" including quantumn board and active exhaust via two PC fans.

    Mar 8, 2020

    Grow Rack v1

    An attempt at bonchi, overwintering ferns, and extending a pepper season using SIP planters on 3 shelves, a full doorframe window, addtional single bulb, and and reflective bubble mylar for the pepper sidewalls
